In 2022, BoJack Horseman voice actor Will Arnett unfolded for one of the first instances on the topic of his "excruciating" break up from Parks and Recreation star Amy Poehler. The Arrested Development co-stars were in combination for 9 years. Nowadays, they're co-parenting their two sons Archie and Abel. On top of that, they are also a sparkly beacon to co-parents in all places, thanks to their mutual admire and continued friendship. We cannot assist but surprise, even though: what used to be their marriage actually like?

Updated September 1, 2023: More than a decade after announcing their divorce, each Amy Poehler and Will Arnett have long gone on to see folks. Will Arnett & Amy Poehler's Relationship Timeline

Arnett had had a weigh down on Poehler since 1996. He first saw her at an improv efficiency with Upright Citizens Brigade. Four years later, he began relationship the Moxie megastar and director. Poehler later confessed that Arnett "makes [her] feel very safe." They sooner or later tied the knot in 2003. Why Will Arnett & Amy Poehler Divorced

Arnett and Poehler's divorce was once finalized in 2016. Through the years, they never shared the reason why in the back of their cut up, themselves. At one level, she did say that "getting a divorce really sucks" â the simplest detailed statement she gave about the breakup. "Imagine spreading everything you care about on a blanket and then tossing the whole thing up in the air," she wrote in her 2014 memoir Yes Please.

"The process of divorce is about loading up that blanket, throwing it up, watching it all spin, and worrying what stuff will break when it lands," she persevered. Arnett additionally hated the press protection in their divorce. He got particularly annoyed at a reporter who claimed to be "Team Amy" at the time. "I wanted to respond and go, 'We're human beings in a relationship and our relationship fell apart. It's heartbreaking. We have two kids, and this is not some f---ing game,'" the actor stated in Dax Shepard's podcast Armchair Expert.

How Is Will Arnett And Amy Poehler's Relationship Today?

The two have remained good friends following their divorce. In April 2020, they were seen self-isolating together all over a virtual tournament called "Strong Together, Tous Ensemble." Isn't that wild," Arnett told E! News of his new lifestyles.

He added that he is thankful for having Poehler as the mother of his older sons. "It's been almost 10 years and my kids are so lucky that Amy is their mother," he mentioned. "And I'm so lucky that we're such a huge part of each other's lives, even more so than we were five years ago." Meanwhile, Poehler remains a single gal (at least that is what she tells the media).
